item.title: Python Projects
item.description: This is a walkthrough of my Python projects that I did in my CSE231 class, and I will discuss what new features each project included from the next. I started coding in the Fall of 2020 in CSE 231: Introduction to Programming I. This is a course in Python, and is meant for people who have little to no experience in coding like I was. CSE 231 covered a large part of Python.
